messages.message:
Okay we only have a couple tests failing this morning, yay!!!

• documents-grid: missing an app that's supposed to be there, cypress human review long doc (I wonder if it somehow got deleted?) @Udit 
• members-crud: new member being added can't be found, perhaps an actual bug? @Xindi Xu 
• view-my-hub: projects list timing out for commercial users - I know there's an effort to decrease loading time but should also increase timeout @Weiming Wu @daniel 
• aihub-data-types: failed to save schema error (flaky, is sometimes passing) @CJ 
• aihub-templates: consistently timing out @Arjun 
• converse/billing: backend race condition, I'm going to try to add some waits and see what happens
• aihub-validation-udf: usually passing, got a timeout on the last run @Serena
is this pulled from the sandbox run? just curious how you aggregated this list since the CI runs seem inconsistent in which tests are getting run

There were two runs on master last night: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/9550/overview/700190f5-a497-45d4-868b-1067965d069f?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1 and https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/9546/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1

4 over the past day: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/analytics/top-failures?branches=%5B%5D&browsers=%5B%5D&chartRangeMostCommonErrors=%5B%5D&chartRangeSlowestTests=%5B%5D&chartRangeTopFailures=%5B%5D&committers=%5B%5D&cypressVersions=%5B%5D&flaky=%5B%5D&operatingSystems=%5B%5D&runGroups=%5B%5D&specFiles=%5B%5D&status=%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Passed%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22PASSED%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22Failed%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22FAILED%22%7D%5D&tags=%5B%7B%22disabled%22%3Afalse%2C%22label%22%3A%22aihub-sandbox-internal%22%2C%22labelProperties%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%23dadade%22%7D%2C%22suggested%22%3Afalse%2C%22value%22%3A%22aihub-sandbox-internal%22%7D%5D&tagsMatch=ANY&timeInterval=WEEK&timeRange=%7B%22startDate%22%3A%222024-05-08%22%2C%22endDate%22%3A%222024-05-09%22%7D&viewBy=TEST_CASE
Oh and this one: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/9542/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1. Converse has been fixed since then, there's a billing failure in that one
i feel like part of what’s weird rn is that the tests don’t consistently pass/fail across envs

Yeah we need to be finding these patterns and trying to fix them across both master and PR branches. Let's aim to get master tests passing, and we can gradually identify what's going on in PRs as people run up against errors
fix for templates (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57187)
the aihub-data-types thing will be fixed by one of my PRs (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57037); i do want to address danny's comments though—i'll get on it next
fix for members-crud (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57191)
I built the app on aihub sandbox that my test looks for so we'll see if it passes now in the next run
otherwise, the test always passes on crafting so no PR needed I think
@Weiming Wu @daniel can you give an update for `view-my-hub` before EOD
My PR to decrease loading time was merged in last week, a bit surprised to see it still hits timeout :thinking_face:.  @Weiming Wu Is the timeout configurable from FE?

@daniel Yes, it's configurable. It might still be hitting timeout because the tests use the default timeout for all our tests, and I'm not able to find anywhere that set our tests to use a timeout larger than the Cypress default of 5000ms.
Hmm I’ll take another shot. For now could you increase the timeout see if that fix the issue?
i would say for now for unblocking lets just increase max timeout limit wherever necessary
if we’re explicitly waiting for the api we can just set the timeout
Do we have a sense of how long the project list endpoint usually takes for our tests? I'm guessing (hoping) that 20s is enough?
Before Daniel’s optimizations and before we cleaned up a lot of projects we were seeing it take up to 30 seconds. It should be much faster now so 20 feels reasonable but also might as well make it 30
